title: Jeremy Renner's Ex-Girlfriends Claim He Did Drugs And Had Wild Sexual Encounters While His 6-Year-Old Was Home

A Contentious Custody Agreement

View photos

Marvel actor Jeremy Renner has found himself in a contentious custody battle with ex-wife Sonni Pacheco. Although the initial agreement was settled in 2017, Pacheco recently petitioned a judge to seek full custody of their 6-year-old daughter, Ava.

Troubling New Details

View photos

In new court documents obtained by TMZ, Pacheco claims that Renner threatened to kill her, had violent outbursts, and had large amounts of cocaine and other drugs in his home within easy access of Ava.

Renner categorically denies these claims.

Accounts From Ex-Girlfriends

View photos

However, three more women have stepped forward to give similar accounts of Renner's behavior. According to court documents obtained by The Daily Mail, Renner's ex-girlfriend Carmen Orford claimed that his house always had a ready supply claimed that Renner always had large amounts of drugs in his home, ran an X-rated Snapchat account, and often threw wild sex parties while his daughter was in the home.

Orford claimed that "[Renner] constantly sent me nude pictures and videos of him touching himself. [He] would also frequently send me unprompted pornographic videos and GIFs."
